Vigilance
[i]Crit[/i] – Whenever Fergus, Carefree Free Knight deals combat damage to a player, put a +1/+1 counter on him.
[i]Pair Up[/i] – Whenever Fergus attacks a player, if exactly one other creature is attacking that player, scry 2, then draw a card.
[i]Charming Knight[/i] – {T}: Target creature gets +X/+X until end of turn, where X is the number of counters on Fergus.
